Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2011 07:53AM Newlife44 wrote: Hi there, I too am sorry to hear you have encountered this.  About a month ago I went to my then boyfriend's house to find his ex-girlfriend there and he admitted they had been seeing each other for a year!  I'm not sure where you put the profile information on here but I was diagnosed in 2008 with stage 4 cancer - and my(once again then boyfriend) saw me through all the treatments only to head back to his ex-girlfriend in 2010 unbeknownst to me(until about 6 weeks ago).  I'm still devastated and mystified how someone could sit through all my treatments only to go behind my back and do what he is done.  It's been 5 years and it will take some time to get over but I know I'll be ok and luckily my doctors are great - the hardist thing will be heading back to see my oncologist as I was used to having the (then boyfriend there).  I've just about gone crazy wondering why he did it but I guess I'd rather know and move on rather than be with someone like that.
Posts.Title: Cheating Husband teamnana car2tenn
